channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - December 25, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-december-25-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Brinkwood Legacy_ * _Camp Flying Moose for Girls of All Kinds_ * _Electric Bastionland_ * _GMAC Masters_ * _Girl Underground_ * _Hit the Nazi: Retrieve the Ark_ * _Night's Black Agents_ * _Offworlders_ * _Trophy Dark_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_ * _Unincorporated_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

@flatvurm wrote:
